sentence.Network_en: Each planet always acts conjointly with the zodiacal sign in which it is found.
sentence.Network_cn: 每个行星总是在被发现的星座上起作用.

sentence.Network_en: In the cognition of an object of sense, both sides are presented conjointly.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我们认知一个客体时, [主观意识][辑有效性]共同出现的.

sentences.sentence: "Our salaries put together couldn't pay for the damage"
"we couldn`t pay for the damages with all out salaries put together"
